physical_appearance:\This coloured print captures three children in party hats. The girl to the right dons a white dress
 paired with knee length socks and red strapped shoes. She holds a painting of Jesus in her hands. To her right
 is a shorter girl in a blouse top and black bottom blowing a party blower. Lastly
 to the girl\u0027s right
 is a boy in a buttoned down shirt and white bottoms. Beneath the image is the caption \\Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. Refugee camp
